judges: Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barriere, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
Order affirmed.
The former Mr. Chief Justice Bell and the former Mr. Justice Barbieri took no part in the consideration or decision of this case.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Steven H. Coldblatt and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, J ames D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Bichard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
casebody.head_matter:
Commonwealth v. Bishop, Appellant.
Submitted November 8, 1971.
Before Bell, C. J., Jones, Eagen, O’Brien, Roberts, Pomeroy and Barriere, JJ.
Mary Bell Hammerman, for appellant.
Steven H. Coldblatt and Milton M. Stein, Assistant District Attorneys, J ames D. Crawford, Deputy District Attorney, Bichard A. Sprague, First Assistant District Attorney, and Arlen Specter, District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
March 20, 1972:
